attributes.action: Don't scrap normal bulbs until all bulb sizes are taken into account
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU are wanting to scrap normal light bulbs. Some bulb sizes are impossible or non existant to buy in the energy efficient ranges. Plus, there are examples were energy lights are not suitable - dimmer switches and those lamps which give several options for brightness

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
